I host private and personal parties to display a fine culinary experience. I have hosted parties as such in Los Angeles and Scottsdale. I also do event planning and market events. This is something I will always continue to do. For more information feel free to contact me.

Over a three year span, in between education and work residence, I did over 200 special and one-time events in the greater Los Angeles area. This included the Oscars, Emmys, Sports Illustrated Parties, Tom Cruises wedding reception, and other high profile parties.References: Mary Pelentay and Nora Sandoval

Job Description: Executive Chef / Food and Beverage Director of a Hollywood Hotspot. Job was referred by Mary Pelentay and Nora Sandoval. It was a great a chance for exposure and received great reviews from a number of publications. I resigned from here to pursue further education.

I worked as a stagerie for Chef Kyle Connaughton in the research lab of Heston Blumenthall. An amazing and eye opening experience. My cooking has a great deal of influence from this upscale fine dining restaurant. My time here was cut short due to an injury. For any culinarian this is highly recommended as I was surrounded by some of the worlds best Chefs.

Charles Jensen is one of the more dynamic figures I have had the pleasure to work with. His work ethic, professional demeanor, and creative thinking are all key assets to his success. Charles has made great strides in his professional career. I have the honor of working with Charles side by side in the growth of one his other companies, Politics On The Rocks. His vision in building a business political network for professionals has come a long way due to his ambition and drive. His versatility in the business world gives him many platforms to work from. A rare individual that can succeed in any field he is presented with. This brief editorial is a honor for me to write on behalf of Charles Jensen, A Business Associate, A Professional, and Good Friend.

I write this recommendation on the behalf of Jorge Portillo. Jorge and I have done business in many different fashions. We both started working with each other in Marketing Fields that covers a broad range. Our marketing expertise comes from Digital Marketing, Traditional Marketing, & Creative Marketing. Currently Jorge has created a Graphic Design Company 'Think Jorge" that is the trusted resource for ScottsdaleNights.com and Scottsdale Media, in which two companies I own. Jorge does Graphic Designing, Print Media, & Digital Marketing for our company. He brings charisma, intelligence, creativity, and great work ethics to his resume. I highly recommend him as a business partner and friend. Please feel free to reach me at anytime to endorse this testimonial.
